alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenwood (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:32PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Abbeville and northwestern Greenwood Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Abbeville, or 6 miles southeast of Lake Secession, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenwood, Abbeville, Ware Shoals, Due West, Lake Secession, Donalds, Cokesbury, Hodges, Shoals Junction and Antreville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
